feed.title: ShinyTracker
feed.subtitle: Lists and displays detected changes on the RSI "Progress Tracker"

entry.title: Progress Tracker Delta - 2024-02-07
entry.summary: Progress Tracker Delta 509 deliverables listed | 2023-11-29 => 2024-02-07 There were 1 modifications, 0 removals, and 0 additions in this update. Please note that not all removals are intentional; there is currently a bug with how time is entered on the Progress Tracker that can cause deliverables to disappear.
